newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Guterres predicts Portugal inflation under 2.0 pct.
newsitem.headline: Guterres predicts Portugal inflation under 2.0 pct.

text.p: Portuguese Prime Minister Antonio Guterres said on Thursday the country's inflation, on a year-on-year basis, could be under two percent in April.

"The trend in recent months has been so positive...that I would risk a forecast that we will have an inflation rate in April under two percent, and if not under then very close," he told an economic conference.
Portugal's year-on-year inflation was running at 2.5 percent in March but analysts have predicted a slowing in April and May.
